Home.title: Welcome to my site
Home.description: This is the English version of the site.

Winery.title: Our Vineyards
Winery.description: Welcome to our winery. We produce high-quality wines using traditional methods combined with modern techniques.

section1.text: Our vineyards are located in the heart of the wine region, where the climate and soil create the perfect environment for growing high-quality grapes.

section2.text: Each bottle of wine is carefully crafted, combining centuries-old tradition with innovative winemaking techniques.

Accommodation.title: Cozy Beach House
Accommodation.description: Enjoy a luxurious stay with stunning sea views and modern amenities. Perfect for families or friends, just a few steps away from the beach.
Accommodation.amenities: 2 Bedrooms, Private Pool, Wi-Fi, Air Conditioning, Kitchen, Sea View
